definition: A required contribution or payment that is typically associated with a specific purpose, such as taxes, fees, or dues. It is commonly used to refer to the act of submitting or delivering something, often in the context of official or administrative procedures.

examples.german: Die Abgabe der Hausaufgaben ist morgen.
examples.english: The submission of the homework is tomorrow.

examples.german: Die Abgabe des Pakets erfolgte pünktlich.
examples.english: The delivery of the package was on time.

examples.german: Die Abgabe der Steuererklärung ist bis zum 31. Mai.
examples.english: The filing of the tax return is due by May 31st.

examples.german: Die Abgabe des Formulars ist online möglich.
examples.english: The submission of the form is possible online.

examples.german: Die Abgabe der Prüfungsunterlagen erfolgt im Sekretariat.
examples.english: The hand-in of the exam documents takes place at the office.
